Package com.jordanzimmerman

Interface Summary
SRPRunner General interface for running through a session.
 

Class Summary
SRPClientSession Manages a client SRP session
SRPClientSessionRunner Runner for clients.
Released into the public domain
SRPConstants POJO for holding the prime number and primitve root.
Released into the public domain
SRPFactory An implementation of SRP-6a - Secure Remote Password Protocol.
SRPInputStream An Output Stream that authenticates and encrypts (using AES).
SRPOutputStream An Output Stream that authenticates and encrypts (using AES).
SRPServerSession Manages a server SRP session
SRPServerSessionRunner runner for server sessions
Released into the public domain
SRPUtils Various utilities
Released into the public domain
SRPVerifier POJO for holding the random salt and verifier
Released into the public domain
 

Exception Summary
SRPAuthenticationFailedException Exception thrown when authentication fails
